data.title: Moderna to test vaccine, confirm it will protect against U.K. Covid variant
data.text: Moderna will run additional trials to confirm whether its vaccine will be effective against the U.K. Covid variant. The company expects its current vaccine will protect individuals from the variant.

data.title: Vaccine Stocks Rebound On Pfizer's U.S. Deal, Moderna OK In Canada
data.text: Coronavirus vaccine stocks yo-yoed Wednesday as Pfizer won a deal for 100 million more doses in the U.S. and Moderna snagged authorization in Canada for people ages 18 and older. The post Vaccine Stocks Rebound On Pfizer's U.S. Deal, Moderna OK In Canada appeared first on Investor's Business Daily.

data.title: Moderna Stock Looks Too Cheap After This Recent Dip
data.text: Investors who enjoyed a five-fold return this year are selling now but more upside approaches as Moderna ships vaccines worldwide. The post Moderna Stock Looks Too Cheap After This Recent Dip appeared first on InvestorPlace.

data.title: Canada authorizes Moderna's COVID-19 vaccine
data.text: Shares of Moderna Inc. were down 0.1% in trading on Wednesday after it said Canada authorized its COVID-19 vaccine for adults. The government there has committed to buying 40 million doses of the vaccine, which requires two doses for each person.

data.title: Health Canada Authorizes Moderna COVID-19 Vaccine in Canada
data.text: CAMBRIDGE, Mass.--(BUSINESS WIRE)--Health Canada authorizes Moderna COVID-19 Vaccine in Canada.

data.title: Moderna (MRNA) Down 30% After Posting All-Time High
data.text: Moderna (MRNA) shareholders have been hitting the exits at an aggressive pace in the last four weeks.
